articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Wednesday, the 21st anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, No Kwang Chol, So Hong Chan, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song and other KPA commanding officers.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The head of the guards of honor of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues. Also laid was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.

articles.title: Leading Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Leading Party, State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and state including Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of party central leadership organ in Pyongyang and officials of the party and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday, demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They entered the hall where the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also seen there was a floral basket in the name of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 They paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Success of Ri Hui Ho's Pyongyang Visit Depends on S. Korean Authorities' Attitude
articles.content:
Success of Ri Hui Ho's Pyongyang Visit Depends on S. Korean Authorities' Attitude
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued a statement on Wednesday denouncing the dishonest forces of south Korea including the puppet conservative media for perpetrating the heinous provocative act of hurting  the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK over the issue of Ri Hui Ho's visit to Pyongyang. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group let the conservative media spread misinformation as regards Ri's visit. It claimed that Ri suggested an overland travel but the leadership of the north side proposed a travel by air in a bid to propagandize among south Koreans Pyongyang International Airport built by the leadership with much effort. And the group also let experts on north Korean affairs float the false story that the north adjusted the timing of Ri's visit to Pyongyang for "its political purpose."
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification let loose a spate of vituperation that it would handle the issue of Ri's visit to Pyongyang with a "principle" despite the fact that officials concerned of the north and the south reached an agreement on it. 
					
					 This is an unpardonable serious provocation against the DPRK as the puppet group brought to light its sinister intention to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last, displeased with the process to improve the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 And this cannot be construed otherwise than a deliberate and vicious obstruction to block Ri's visit by getting on the nerves of the DPRK.
					
					 In connection with Ri's course of visit to Pyongyang, the DPRK told the Kim Dae Jung Peace Center that it was better for Ri to travel to Pyongyang by air to the best convenience of the guests as the Pyongyang-Kaesong Highway is under repair and the officials concerned of the south side fully agreed with it.
					
					 It was reported that Ri accepted our sincere proposal with pleasure. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should not recklessly wag their tongues, clearly understanding that the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Kim Dae Jung Peace Center just tentatively agreed on the issue of Ri's Pyongyang visit at the working-level contact and it has not been fully confirmed. 
					
					 We solemnly warn that if the south Korean conservative group persistently hurts the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and makes provocations against it, the hard-won opportunity may be scuppered. 
					
					 Ri Hui Ho's successful Pyongyang visit depends on the behavior of the puppet group.

articles.title: Personal Letter to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Personal Letter to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a personal letter from Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj.
					 The personal letter was conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by special envoy of the Mongolian president Damda Ganhuyag, secretary of State of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the secretary.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Mongolian President Here
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Mongolian President Here
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Special envoy of the Mongolian president Damda Ganhuyag, secretary of State of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and his party arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The special envoy of the Mongolian president and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Officials, service persons, people from all walks of life and schoolchildren visited the statues and portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il across the country on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of the President.
					 A floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un was seen standing before their statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 Officials, service persons, working people and schoolchildren laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues, portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pictures depicting them at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang and across the country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here, a delegation of the National Assembly of Vietnam, a delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Wednesday, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They paid high tribute to the President and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They entered the halls where the great leaders lie in state to pay homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 On the same day the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Given
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Given
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Remembrance concert "People's Ever-lasting Memory" was given by artistes of national art troupes at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Wednesday, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were working people, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Orchestra and chorus "Song of Loyalty", all-people hymn resounded forth in the theater amid the memory and reverence for the President.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as narration and music "Benefactor of Nation" and female duet and chorus "Song of Best Wishes", an immortal classic.
					
					 The artistes sang high praises of the revolutionary feats the President performed by working such unprecedented miracles as defeating the formidable enemies U.S. and Japanese imperialists through long journeys of bloody anti-Japanese battles and hard-fought war and building an invincible socialist power on this land.
					
					 Also put on the stage were such numbers as narration and music "Our leader" and female solo and chorus "Great Torrent of Yearning".
					
					 And staged were numbers reflecting the firm determination of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Korean Documentary Film Screened
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "Fatherly Leader among Officials" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of ministries and national institutions.
					
					 The film shows impressive scenes telling how the President took deep care of the work and life of officials and led them forward with warm loving care from the first period of building a new country to the last moments of his life so that they could keep to the path of the revolution following the party.

articles.title: Comradeship between Kim Il Sung and Allende
articles.content:
Comradeship between Kim Il Sung and Allende
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had intimacy with many foreign personages in the struggle for global peace and independence.
					 Among them was former Chilean President Salvador Allende Gossens.
					
					 He was deeply moved by the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and made up his mind to meet the President. In an interview during his Cuban visit, he said that he was eager to meet Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Il Sung met Allende on a visit to the DPRK in Juche 58 (1969), saying that he was very glad to meet a comrade-in-arms fighting in the common anti-imperialist front and regarded it as his pride to have a good Chilean friend as Allende. And the President invited Allende to visit Pyongyang again, calling on him to share eternal comradeship with each other in the struggle against imperialism.
					
					 After his DPRK visit, Allende praised President Kim Il Sung as an incarnation of independence and justice and regarded the President's teachings on the Latin American revolution as an absolute truth and motto of his life.
					
					 During his term of office as the Chilean president, he devoted himself to putting an end to the domination by the imperialists and the domestic monopoly capitalists in conspiracy with them over his country and to meeting the interests and demand of the working masses.
					
					 When a coup d'etat against his government was engineered, he died a heroic death on the battlefield.
					
					 Upon receiving the news of his death on the way of field guidance, President Kim Il Sung saw to it that messages of condolence and wreaths in his name were sent to the widow of Allende and the Chilean embassy in Pyongyang.
					
					 The President also took a measure to announce the national mourning day for the death of Allende.
					
					 Noting that he was very sorry for being absent at the memorial service held in the Chilean embassy, the President bestowed his time on having a meal with the couple of the Chilean charge d'affaires. Later he showed loving care for Allende's younger sister in exile to receive medical treatment in the DPRK.
					
					 When the general secretary of the Socialist Party of Chile and his party visited the DPRK in 1974, Kim Il Sung recalled Allende's heroic struggle, saying that the Korean people regarded him as a hero for not only the Chilean people but also the working class the world over.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Global Peace
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Global Peace
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- With the death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (July 8) as an occasion, the DPRK people recollect the undying feats he had performed for global peace under the banner of independence against imperialism
					 By defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in the 20th century, Kim Il Sung made a big contribution to defending the peace and security of Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 He also indicated important guidelines to be adhered to in the struggle for global peace, through publication of his many works. One of them is "Let Us Shatter Imperialist Moves towards Aggression and War and Safeguard Peace and Independence", a speech he delivered at a party given in honor of the delegates to the World Conference of Journalists against Imperialism and for Friendship and Peace on July 3, Juche 72 (1983).
					
					 In his lifetime, the President had met a large number of foreign personages, telling about the principles to be maintained in the struggle for global peace and its tasks and ways.
					
					 In his talks with an editor of the Peruvian Newspapers Expreso and Extra in August 1975, he said: If we avoid fighting against imperialism or make unprincipled compromises with it, we cannot bring about genuine peace. Only by determined struggle against imperialism can we halt and frustrate the imperialist schemes for aggression and war and maintain world peace.
					
					 In February 1981, he met the leader of the French Social Party and underscored the need for the European nations not to join any block but maintain independence in order to deter a new world war.
					
					 In June 1992 when he met the chairman of the Communists Labor Party of Sweden, the President stressed that the progressive people the world over should unite as one and invariably hold fast to the banner of anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle to defend the global peace and security and build a free and peaceful world.

articles.title: Fish Catch Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Fish Catch Increases in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Fishery stations in the west coastal area of the DPRK are making good hauls.
					 According to data available, they overfulfilled the first half-yearly quotas at 105 percent by putting the survey of fishing grounds and fishing prediction on a scientific basis.

articles.title: DPRK's Papers Observe Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
DPRK's Papers Observe Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading papers Wednesday editorially observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The President was a benefactor of national resurrection and founder of the DPRK and founder and leader of the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea, whom the Korean people should hold in high esteem for eternity, the papers note, adding that his revolutionary exploits will last forever.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The revolutionary history of the President is shining as a sacred one as he set an example of the times in building a revolutionary party and invincible state under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 He set forth lots of ideas and lines such as theories on the party's ideological and organizational construction and leadership art, the line of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence and the line of the three revolutions-ideological, technical and cultural. They are still displaying tremendous vitality in the party-building and building of a thriving nation.
					
					 What is important in his feats performed for party-building and nation-building is that he laid a firm groundwork for the party and country to emerge victorious not only in the present generation but in the generations to come.
					
					 It was one of his greatest exploits performed for the eternal future of the party and country that he perfectly settled the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause, in particular.
					
					 Thanks to his revolutionary exploits the DPRK has been able to adhere to the revolutionary principle and hold aloft the red flag of socialism and make a breakthrough in the building of a thriving nation even in the worst adversity and usher in a heyday of bolstering the leadership ability and militant might of the party and the power of the great Paektusan nation in the new century of Juche, too.
					
					 It was thanks to his popular leadership that the party has been able to be respected as a mother party which has taken care of the people's destiny under its red flag and the country has been able to earn the fame of the mother who brings a worthy life and happiness to the people, protecting them from any storm and stress.
					
					 He was a prominent leader and peerless patriot who carved out a rosy future of the party and country, the papers conclude, calling for holding him in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages to glorify forever his undying revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Dismisses S. Korean Conservative Media's False Propaganda
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Dismisses S. Korean Conservative Media's False Propaganda 
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The conservative media of south Korea are playing the role of a shock force in the puppet regime's anti-DPRK false propaganda. 
					 They are busy floating wild rumor about "instability of the social system in the north," talking sheer nonsense that "a deputy chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army fled to Seoul" and "somebody was executed." 
					
					 These are no more than sheer lies.
					
					The general officer whom the conservative media of south Korea described as "a defector from the north" is now commanding a construction project at the Masikryong Ski Resort to spruce up it better so that more cheerful laughter of people is heard. 
					
					 The story about "execution of someone" being floated by them as a "news from Ryanggang Province" is also sheer sophism.
					
					 The false propaganda of the south Korean puppet conservative media is a foolish and base politically-motivated conspiratorial farce and an act of treachery aimed to create impressions in the world community that there are uneasiness and horror in the dignified DPRK in a bid to tarnish its image and break its solid single-minded unity.
					
					 The conservative media of south Korea were reduced to experts on telling lies long ago as they put into the shade Nazis, the world's most wicked tricksters. They are no more than a group of traitors without equals keen on letting loose invectives blocking the improvement of the north-south relations, disturbing national reconciliation and unity and hurling mud at compatriots.
					
					 Their vitriol disclosed their true colors as the worst swindlers and hack media persons who besmirch the world with lies and fabrications by discarding the mission of the press whose life and soul is justice and truth. 
					
					  The south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) is behind their false propaganda against the DPRK.
					
					  It is the trite method of the puppet authorities including the IS to orchestrate such poor farce by mobilizing reptile media in a bid to attain their despicable purposes.
					
					 Typical examples of their false propaganda are the fictions that "Vice Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kil Jae Gyong sought asylum in the U.S." though he died long ago and his remains are buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery of the DPRK and its nuclear scientists "fled to a foreign country" though they are engaged in normal researches in their field. The conservative media had vied with each other to float such fictions, pursuant to scenarios of the IS. They only became a laughing stock of the world.
					
					 The recently floated fictions are part of their false propaganda.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is busy conducting such propaganda against the DPRK on the basis of sheer lies fabricated by ultra-right conservative media persons in a sinister effort to create misunderstanding of the DPRK in the international community and thus justify the anti-DPRK confrontation and "human rights" smear campaign. 
					
					 This time they hurled even conservative media women into the false propaganda to impair the dignity and social system of the DPRK. This is, however, nothing but a daydream of confrontation maniacs. 
					
					 The IS and ultra-right conservative media of south Korea will have to pay a high price for this ridiculous ruckus.

articles.title: All Koreans Called on to Join Efforts for August 15 Joint National Event
articles.content:
All Koreans Called on to Join Efforts for August 15 Joint National Event
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement titled "Let us usher in the second June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity" on July 4, the 43rd anniversary of the July 4 joint statement.
					 It said that the publication of the July 4 joint statement was a historic national event as it advanced the correct idea and principle for national reunification movement.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification clarified in the joint statement remain as a basic principle for the country's reunification in the hearts of all Koreans in the south, the north and overseas, it noted.
					
					 It called on all Koreans in the south, the north and overseas to take it as the basic principle for solving the reunification issue to achieve independence against the U.S., and shape their destiny and way independently by their concerted efforts.
					
					 It appealed to them to wage a dynamic struggle under the banner of the joint declaration to check moves escalating confrontation against national reconciliation and reunification and bringing a war.
					
					 It called for staging vigorous struggle to have the "Security Law" and "May 24 step" abolished and surely hold the August 15 joint national event this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Stages Actions against U.S. and Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Stages Actions against U.S. and Regime
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea staged strong anti-U.S., anti-regime actions outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on July 4, the 43rd anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
					 Members of the solidarity headed for the U.S. embassy after leaving the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul, holding a placard reading "GIs, quit south Korea, taking anthrax germs with them!" and chanting anti-U.S. slogans.
					
					 They scattered hundreds of leaflets containing the solidarity's declaration of July 4 actions and such slogans as "GIs, chief culprit of anthrax germ introduction and pressure for THAAD deployment, quit this land!"
					
					 When dozens of policemen guarding the embassy blocked their march, they went around the embassy to continue their actions.
					
					 Infuriated by the reckless repressive actions of the police, the solidarity held a meeting before the embassy, calling for achieving independence, peace and great national unity and demanding the anti-reunification regime step down.
					
					 Speakers there called for staging actions to oust the present regime and reunify the country by implementing the July 4 joint statement, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 Chanting slogans, the participants marched toward the "government" building from the U.S. embassy.
					
					 There they held a ceremony for declaring a grand march for peace.
					
					 In the declaration of July 4 actions, the solidarity clarified its will to stage ceaseless protest actions against the U.S. and the anti-reunification regime on important occasions, not yielding to any threat and suppression.

articles.title: S. Korean Regimes Slammed for Resorting to Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Regimes Slammed for Resorting to Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., posted an article contributed by member of the editorial board Ri Jun Sik on July 3 under the title of "70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, independent Korea and sycophantic south Korea".
					 The cause of independence which was pioneered and has won victories with the arms of Mt. Paektu makes justice and progressive conscience of the world look up to the DPRK, the article said.
					
					 Contrary to it, south Korea's history of sycophancy and treachery which has now been inherited by the daughter of "yusin" since its start by the pro-U.S. Syngman Rhee regime offers visual understanding of where the worship for the U.S. originates, it charged.
					
					 Overseas Koreans are actively joining south Koreans in protesting against the humiliating act committed by the descendant of "yusin" who has not been awake from the illusion about "unification through absorption" which brings benefits to foreign forces while styling herself a lackey of the U.S. and Japan, it noted.
					
					 In a word, it is embarrassing to mention the hopeless future of south Korea which has had the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese history, it concluded.

articles.title: Noise Pollution by U.S. Forces in S. Korea
articles.content:
Noise Pollution by U.S. Forces in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea conducted a loud fireworks display on July 4, giving sufferings to the south Korean people, according to south Korean CBS.
					 They conducted it in their base that day under the pretext of marking independence day. The noise level was reported to be much higher than the standard.
					
					 Each fireworks display has been strongly protested by the south Korean people but the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have rather justified it.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries from June 27 to 30 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a seminar in Romania, lecture in Guinea and round-table talks in Ethiopia.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the President and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania said in his speech that the President led the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and thus liberated the country and built a genuine socialist state in Korea, a state in which the people became its masters.
					
					 He said that thanks to the President's wise leadership the DPRK has shed its rays as a socialist power all over the world.
					
					 A Guinean personage said in his lecture that the President founded the Juche idea and Songun idea and successfully embodied them, demonstrating their truth and vitality before the world.
					
					 Though the President passed away, his idea and cause are given steady continuity, he added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A Russian organ and a Nigerian body posted articles on their websites on July 1 to observe the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Eastern Siberian Publishing House in Irkutsk Region of Russia in an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling President said that after embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens, he founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, providing valuable ideological and theoretical wealth common to mankind.
					
					 He liberated the country through a protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 He led the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' and their allies' aggression to a victory, wisely led the post-war rehabilitation and construction and social revolution of various stages, turning the DPRK into a country centered on the  popular masses and a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 He also made undying contributions to the cause of Korea's reunification and the global cause of independence.
					
					 He was, indeed, the most prominent leader representing the 20th century, a peerlessly great man and a great sage of mankind.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, peerless strategist" praised him for defeating the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world with his gifted military wisdom, original strategies and tactics and superb war methods.

articles.title: Bulgarian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Bulgarian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The great revolutionary Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be revered as the leader of the people and the sun of Juche as he glorified the 20th century as the century of the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of socialism.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said this in a statement on July 2 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The great victory and successes the Korean people achieved in the anti-Japanese revolution, the Fatherland Liberation War and the Juche-oriented building of socialist state would have been unthinkable without the august name of the President.
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the era of independence through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and worked hard to accomplish the popular masses' cause of independence and socialism.
					
					 The President regarded the country's reunification as the greatest patriotic cause of the nation and laid down the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and made all efforts to realize them.
					
					 The Korean people hold him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK in praise of his immortal revolutionary feats.

articles.title: Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Solidarity meetings, lectures and film shows took place in Bulgaria, Guinea and Angola on June 25 and 30 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said that the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S.-led imperialist aggressor forces and firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 More than six decades have passed since the Korean Armistice Agreement was concluded, but the U.S. policy to stifle socialist Korea remains unchanged.
					
					 That is why the progressives and the anti-imperialist peace-loving forces in the world set the period from June 25 to July 27 every year as a month of anti-U.S. joint struggle and have conducted widespread solidarity activities denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and "Provocateur of Korean War".
					
					 Meanwhile, the France-DPRK Friendship Association held a consultative meeting to strengthen the solidarity with the Korean people on June 29.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in booklet by a German publishing house.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity such as the issue of founding a reunified state through the great national unity and achieving unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, the issue of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and stopping all partisan disputes fanning up split and confrontation between compatriots, the issue for the north and the south to trust and unite with each other and the issue of not rejecting people because of differing isms but joining hands on the road of national reunification.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 21o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, No Kwang Chol, So Hong Chan, Jo Nam Jin, Ryom Chol Song y otros comandantes del EPC.
					
					Cuando entraba el Mariscal en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron colocados al pie de ellas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del EPC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, el Mariscal rindio homenaje a los  grandes lideres ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de maxima recordacion nacional, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de mando del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en esta capital, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales visitaron el dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir el postumo homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres estaba depositado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el otro a nombre del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Se deposito un cesto de flores a nombre comun del CC del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el CDN, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres ante sus estatuas de pie y en los halles de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, y las otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por los grandes hombres hasta el ultimo periodo de sus visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Visita de Ri Hui Ho a Pyongyang depende de actitud de autoridades surcoreanas, advierte CCPAP
articles.content:
Visita de Ri Hui Ho a Pyongyang depende de actitud de autoridades surcoreanas, advierte CCPAP
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Los medios de prensa conservadores y las fuerzas hostiles del Sur de Corea insultan la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el trato de la visita a Pyongyang de la senora Ri Hui Ho. 
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion.
					
					Los medios de prensa conservadores, instigados por los titeres surcoreanos, maldicen que la senora Ri Hui Ho solicito la visita por via terrestre, pero la "Direccion del Norte de Corea propuso el uso de avion a fin de propagar al Sur de Corea el Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang reconstruido recientemente con muchos esfuerzos". 
					
					Y los especialistas en los "asuntos norcoreanos" divulgan el rumor erroneo de que la RPDC ajusta el periodo de la visita para "utilizarla en sus fines politicos".
					
					Los funcionarios correspondientes de ambas partes ya acordaron la visita de la senora Ri a Pyongyang. Sin embargo, los compinches del Ministerio de Unificacion expresan que tratarian este tema segun el "principio". 
					
					Esta grave provocacion a la RPDC demuestra abiertamente la malsana intencion de los titeres surcoreanos, indeseados de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, de enfrentarse con la RPDC e impedir la visita a Pyongyang de la senora Ri. 
					
					En cuanto a la ruta de la visita a Pyongyang de la anciana, hemos presentado al Centro de Paz Kim Dae Jung la opinion de que seria mejor el viaje aereo en el punto de vista de dar facilidades a los huespedes porque esta en reparacion la autopista Pyongyang-Kaesong y lo consintieron los funcionarios correspondientes surcoreanos. 
					
					Se dice que la senora Ri tambien acepto con placer nuestra bondad. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben medirse en sus palabras dandose clara cuenta de que en el contacto de trabajo entre el CCPAP y el Centro de Paz Kim Dae Jung, ambas partes acordaron provisionalmente el tema de la visita a Pyongyang de la senora Ri y no lo han completado todavia.
					
					Advertimos seriamente que si los conservadores surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a la provocacion insultando gravemente hasta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, resultara vana la oportunidad preparada a duras penas. 
					
					La visita a Pyongyang de la senora Ri Hui Ho depende de la actitud de los titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Concierto "Recuerdo inolvidable de pueblo" dedicado a 8 de julio
articles.content:
Concierto "Recuerdo inolvidable de pueblo" dedicado a 8 de julio
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este el concierto de los artistas de las entidades artisticas centrales "Recuerdo inolvidable del pueblo" dedicado al 21o aniversario del deceso del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Lo vieron los trabajadores y estudiantes jovenes capitalinos.
					
					Se pusieron en la escena la musica orquestal y el coro "Cancion de  fidelidad", que describen la anoranza al Presidente de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					En la narracion y la musica "Benefactor de la nacion", el coro mixto "General Kim Il Sung es nuestro sol", el trio masculino "Canta, bifurcacion a Mangyongdae", el duo femenino y coro "Cancion de la bendicion", el coro mixto "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!" y otras piezas, los ejecutantes elogiaron fervientemente las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente quien creo el milagro sin precedentes en la historia al vencer a dos imperialistas poderosos y establecio en esta tierra la potencia socialista invicta.
					
					Las otras piezas reflejan la firme voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria de Juche siguiendo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Proyectado documental coreano dedicado al 8 de julio
articles.content:
Proyectado documental coreano dedicado al 8 de julio
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 21o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, se proyecto el dia 8 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el documental coreano intitulado "El Presidente Kim Il Sung entre los funcionarios".
					Lo vieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de los ministerios y los organos centrales.
					
					El filme muestra los episodios emocionantes de que el Presidente codujo a los funcionarios a seguir el camino de la revolucion bajo la direccion del Partido prestando profunda atencion al trabajo y la vida de ellos desde el primer periodo de la construccion de nueva patria hasta el ultimo momento de su vida.
